alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 11:45PM EDT until September 22 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Niagara County in western New York... Orleans County in western New York... Northwestern Monroe County in western New York... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1144 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newfane, or 7 miles north of Lockport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greece, Chili, Lockport, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Gates-North Gates and Newfane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
